attributes.description:
THE BEST HAS NEVER LOOKED BETTER
As a first of its kind, with over three decades of constant improvement in design and performance, the Vitara name has blazed the way forward for compact SUVs. Now, four generations later, the all-new Vitara Brezza defies all the odds and continues to deliver on the exceptional.

 

The Vitara Brezza’s contemporary design pays homage to the Vitara’s Compact SUV heritage. The brawny exterior is adorned with a touch of modern pizzazz. The Vitara Brezza’s 1.5?  engine is perfectly coupled with a premium and sporty luxury-fitted cabin to make sure your drive isn’t just good, it is the best.

This Vehacle Is Very Clean Inside And Outside, Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition.

attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient

attributes.description:
Welcome to the world of the New Renault Kwid which features a host of new styling, design and safety features. The New Kwid becomes more modern and assertive; the new front fascia exudes a sense of aggression which is nowhere to be found amongst its competition. The Kwid’s sleek style is underlined by new Signature Ornate Lighting. The SUV-styled headlamps and silver streak LED DRLs create a striking impression. At the rear, tail lamps with LED light guides leave a distinct trail.
The exterior design is further enhanced with the new boomerang shaped sculpted roof with arching roof rails. The stylish new grille and its imposing front adds prominence to the Kwid’s renowned SUV-look, while the new 14” multi-spoke wheels with a high 180mm ground clearance further accentuate the SUV stance. The New Kwid also comes with SUV-styled skid plates that prevent damage to the under body on rough terrain, ensuring a hassle-free drive and complete peace-of-mind
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 2 550.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 14 490.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

COMFORT & CONVENIENCE
